name: bludhaven
title: Bludhaven State Penitentiary [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]
summary: I developed a synthetic database based upon a fictional correctional facility from the DC Comics Universe. By law, inmates are required to receive a high standard of medical and mental health care. Correctional officers, medical providers, and regulatory bodies require constant access to medical records and operations data.</br></br> Explore how business intelligence tools are leveraged to optimize prison operations and improve inmate rehabilitation programs, ultimately transforming the penitentiary into a nationwide model for offender rehabilitation and re-entry.

name: spat
title: SP Tutoring and Test Prep [UNDER CONSTRUCTION]
summary: This test prep and college admissions consulting business started small, propelled by a passionate heart for for helping local students and their families navigate the pressures of modern academics. In time, it grew to be a signifcant regional player without losing its original identity or its repuation for ''compassionate smarts''.</br></br> Learn about the pipelines used by leadership to power business decisions and lend transparency to operations including payment processing, scheduling, and customer relationship management.
